title: Very functional bag
review_text: I've had this bag for well over a year now.  I have a toddler and a preschooler and it works just fine to carry their stuff and mine for everyday  outings.  It has also held up well.  I've washed it a few times and it comes out looking very good.  I really like the separate compartments which make it much easier to find that one little thing.  I like the pockets on the front strap for a cell phone and a nuk.  So nice to have those right at hand.  I also like the fact that it goes across the body...no more hitting my daughter with the diaper bag when I lean down to pick her up.  The bottle holder thing is very small, so I don't really use it.

product_name: JJ Cole Essentials Sling Style Backpack Diaper Bag: Baby
title: The Perfect Bag - A Mother's Best Friend
review_text: I read several reviews about the JJ Cole Essentails Sling Diaper Bag before I chose to purchase it.  The reviews did not let me down!  This is a great diaper bag that even dad will be proud to carry around.  The compartments are large enough to hold a days outing worth of supplies for your little one and even a few items for yourself.  This bag is large enough to work as both your diaper bag and purse while being small enough to not feel as if you're taking your whole nursery with you.  The best feature of this diaper bag is that it is a sling.  You won't have to fumble around anymore like with the usual shoulder bag that just doesn't stay in place while toting a little one on your hip or over your shoulder

product_name: JJ Cole Essentials Sling Style Backpack Diaper Bag: Baby
title: use it for myself too...
review_text: This bag is very useful, many pockets so everything is in order. Looks very cool, I sometimes use it for myself as aswell. The downside is sometimes it is hard to remember which pocket you put your stuff in. And it would be easier to use if it was symetrical so that I can carry it either on my left or right shoulder. But as a result I am glad that I have it :)

product_name: JJ Cole Essentials Sling Style Backpack Diaper Bag: Baby
title: great size, ok quality
review_text: I have a 2-year-old daughter and a little boy due in July, so I wanted to get something a bit more portable than my big Kate Spade bag.  I've been looking for something like this for a while.  The size is great- you can fit so many things in it- about 5 sz. 4 diapers and a wipe container, as well as snacks, toys, cell phone, wallet...the list goes on and on.  However, I am on my 2nd one already- the quality of the bag is not the greatest.  The cord that cinches the bottle holder broke within 2 days, and one of the zippers fell off.  I just took the 2nd one on vacation, and though it was great for traveling, the bottle holder is already fraying along the top.  I will keep this one, however...it is only $30, so I guess I could always get another one later down the road and not be too upset about it

product_name: JJ Cole Essentials Sling Style Backpack Diaper Bag: Baby
title: GREAT BAG!!!
review_text: this bag was purchased a month ago to ease my long flight from california to NY with my 10 month old who was sick and teething at the time. well it was a great purchase. i didn't have to fumble for my id, or fumble for her juice or anything. i use it everyday now. it holds everything we need it to hold. the middle pouch we put her container of cheerios and dried fruit snacks with some biter biscuits as well. and the bottom pouch i put my wallet with disposable changing pads and placemats and bibs, and the top one i put her diapers and wipes and occasionally her juice cup since they're wider than a bottle is so they don't fit in the bottle holder. i also use the bottle holder to put her crackers in it for the restaurants. it's a wonderful bag, hooks onto the stroller which is a wonderful thing and it doesn't slip off your shoulder like the big bulky bags. i think every mom needs one of these bags!

product_name: Eddie Bauer® 2-in-1 Harness Buddy: Baby
title: My Kids Love it!
review_text: People may say a leash for my kid in inhumane, but I'd rather than they get run over by a car or lost at the mall.  My kids love wearing these things, and they look cute.  The leash part being on the tail can be a little annoying if my toddler is lagging, and she gets mad cause I'm pulling the tail up over her shoulder.

product_name: Eddie Bauer® 2-in-1 Harness Buddy: Baby
title: ABSOLUTELY WONDERFUL
review_text: This harness buddy is the best harness system I've ever brought, and i've brought several. It's soft and cute so my son loves it, and it's sturdy and strong so i love it.  It gives me the peace of mind that i need and the space that my growing little one needs.  Its just perfectly wonderful... If you have a busy little one that doesn't like to stay in any one place for very long then you definately need one.

product_name: Eddie Bauer® 2-in-1 Harness Buddy: Baby
title: Awesome - Keeps My Son in Tow!
review_text: My son loves the way this looks and keeps his little cars in it while we're on the run and shopping, etc.  The cars keep him busy while I shop and the "tether/tail" keeps me from worrying about him scurrying off - as he has been known to do in the past.  Others have actually stopped us to ask where we got it

product_name: Eddie Bauer® 2-in-1 Harness Buddy: Baby
title: CHILD HARNESS
review_text: I LIKE IT BECAUSE IT LOOKS LIKE A KIDDIE BACKPACK INSTEAD OF A LEASH, EVERYONE SAYS IT IS CUTE. I FELT BAD CAUSE SOME PEOPLE LOOK AT IT LIKE A LEASH, BUT WHEN YOU GO SOMEPLACE LIKE DISNEYLAND, I SAW EVERYONE WITH THEM, SO I DIDN'T FEEL SO BAD. IT GIVES A FREE-SPIRITED CHILD LIKE MINE THE FREEDOM THEY CRAVE WITHOUT PUTTING THEM IN HARMS WAY OR HAVING TO DROP EVERYTHING AND CHASE THEM ALL OVER THE MALL

product_name: Eddie Bauer® 2-in-1 Harness Buddy: Baby
title: Very usable product from super seller
review_text: Very happy with product and extremely pleased with customer service of travelwithkids

product_name: Eddie Bauer® 2-in-1 Harness Buddy: Baby
title: Now we both feel safer!
review_text: My 1 year old went from crawling straight to RUNNING.  I bought this harness after I set him down in a store while I paid at the checkout, and he was gone in a flash.  Luckily, we were the only ones in the small store.  It scared me enough to search out a harness.  We tried it on at home and it works great!  It comes fully assembled, all you do is click the two belts into place.  It goes on like a vest.  It's light and soft and loose enough to not bother him at all.  He wears it around like a backpack and thinks he's pretty awesome with his new accessory.  We only use it when we're out shopping and there are no carts for him to sit in, though.  But please use it sparingly - if I wanted a wild thing on a leash, I would have bought a puppy

product_name: Eddie Bauer® 2-in-1 Harness Buddy: Baby
title: some peace of mind in a little bear package
review_text: our 2yo is the type to take off at a moments' notice, so it was nice to find this. Indespensible in the airport, mall, or theme parks. I don't recommend overusing it, though

product_name: Munchkin Diaper Changing Organizer: Baby
title: Great for cloth diapers
review_text: Most diaper hangers have one compartment for a big stack of disposables. We use a variety of cloth diapers and this organizer is great because it has space to hold our prefolds, fitteds, doublers, pockets and inserts, and covers. I haven't loaded heavy things onto it, but I've never had a problem with the shelves being unstable as another reviewer did

product_name: On The Go Potty - Blue: Baby
title: Great portable kids potty
review_text: This potty is so small and easy to use on the go, making it an indespensable tool in potty training. It comes with a little carrying bag and folds up so small you can fit in in a small bag, a large purse, under a seat in the car, just about anywhere, so you can have it handy when kids need to go. This way kids being potty trained don't have to use large adult toilets in public restrooms if they aren't comfortable and they can use this anywhere, if there isn't a restroom nearby. The refill bags could get expensive so we just use generic plastic bags and they work fine too

product_name: Cosco High Back Booster Car Seat, Jacob: Baby
title: great seat for the price
review_text: We brought this seat for the daughter when she out grew her infant seat.  I think we paid about $35.00 at wal mart for it.  It lasted her two years and then we used it with  oru son for a year until the plastic on the seat(where you  hook up the harness broke.  It is also easy to clean.  Alothough taking off the cover can be a little tricky

product_name: Cosco High Back Booster Car Seat, Jacob: Baby
title: Great product, easy to install and handle.
review_text: For the price, this car seat is great.  Seem similar products for double the price.  Quality is also great

product_name: Cosco High Back Booster Car Seat, Jacob: Baby
title: Great seat , great price
review_text: I bought this seat to bridge the gap between baby seat and booster seat for my 17mos old boy. He's 24 lbs and 32" and the fit is fine. No issues with the harness system or the installation. It's not the most stylish seat, but for that price who really cares. Seems comfy, easily adjustable and has a cup holder. The boy likes it better than his Eddie Bauer baby seat that cost 3 times as much.

product_name: Cosco High Back Booster Car Seat, Jacob: Baby
title: Comfortable and easy to use
review_text: The top clip is not difficult for me to use but my daughter hasn't figured it out yet - which is the way I want it.  I've also used it as a booster and I was satisfied with the way the buckle looped through and stayed in place.  I also like the strap on the bottom that allows me to add a little slack or tighten it a little.  I think that's a really important feature - especially in this season when my kid may be wearing a jacket one day and none the next and also if you use the car seat for different kids that are similar but not exactly the same size.  I have another car seat without that and I find that sometimes I can't get it closed because it's too tight and sometimes there's too much slack

product_name: Moby Wrap Baby Carrier-Chocolate: Baby
title: we now walk to the lake everyday!
review_text: Our daughter is 9 months old, she is only 16lbs... but I wish I had found the Moby wrap sooner!  :)  We live about a mile from a large lake, and before she was born, we would walk there at least twice a week, we also do a lot of hiking. We had been using our baby Bjorn, but it was starting to hurt our backs and especially our shoulders, and the padding got lumpy after i washed it. I received my wrap on Friday, I have walked to the lake and back with my daughter in the wrap everyday since... we have tried the Joey and hug positions, and I can feel her weight a little in the Joey one, but on the way home, I turn her around into the hug position, and she falls asleep... and it feels like I'm not even carrying a baby!  The weight distribution is great and now I have no excuses to not get out and exercise!  :) She seems to love it too! I have two friends who are due in the next three months, and I think I will have to get them their own as baby shower gifts! I heard before i ordered it that it was hard to use, but once i read the wonderful book that comes with it, it was a piece of cake! :

product_name: Moby Wrap Baby Carrier-Chocolate: Baby
title: easy on your back....
review_text: It is true what others are saying this product is really easy n your back, I have tried others and this one is far more better.  My only complaint is that it is a little difficult to put on, but with practice you get the hang of it.  Oh! be patiente too, at time while you are learning your baby might not like it because she might get fussy waiting for you, so do it when she is in a good mood or practice first with a doll

product_name: Moby Wrap Baby Carrier-Chocolate: Baby
title: Why didn't I get this sooner!?
review_text:
I purchased this when my child was already going on 4 months old. He's a long tall boy, and it being winter time, I haven't had the occassion to use this as much except in church and around the house. Why oh why didn't I get this initially? I had the NOJO baby sling, which was great when I was in my twenties but really pinched a nerve (literally) on me over a decade later. My back feels SO much better with this product. Especially if you are already a top heavy person, this sling is  a relief. 

I love the color, and we'll be going to Florida in two months. I intend to use this at the beach and maybe the zoo

product_name: Standard - Level 1 Silicone Nipple - 3 Pack: Baby
title: Best bottles on the market!
review_text: If you have a fussy baby or just bottle feed, Dr. Brown's are the best.  We have twin girls and first 3 months they were gased up and it was not fun.  Someone recommended Dr. Brown's bottles, which we were willing to try anything, and they were the best thing we have ever used.  If you have a fussy baby then you will know what I am talking about.  If you are giving a gift for a baby shower, this is the best gift you could give.  I can't say enough good things are Dr. Brown's.  I was upset our doctor did not tell us about these bottles, instead she had us giving them drops and buying the most expensive formula on the market.  Nothing worked until these bottles.

product_name: Maclaren Volo Saffron Orange Stroller: Baby
title: Overall Good Stroller, worth the $$$
review_text:
Good:
1 Light weight
2 Mesh/breathable fabric for warm weather
3 Handles are tall enough for woman in heels, or husbands.
4 Nice colors
5 Easier to steer than other stollers. (can use 1 hand)
6 Folds flat and has carry handle

Bad:
1 Too light to put your bag or purse on the handles, will tip with no baby in it.
2 Doesn't recline
3 Sometimes the 5 point harness takes more effort to unclip

Overall, this is a good investment. Turns out most parents will end up using thier compact 'umbrella' stoller way more than the deluxe, super gadget stoller. It's so much easier to use these simple light weight strollers, than their bulky, wide, heavy counterparts.

product_name: Maclaren Volo Saffron Orange Stroller: Baby
title: The Only Stroller You'll Keep
review_text:
When I was pregnant with my son I received one of those big, bulky strollers as a baby shower gift, but after my son grew out of the attaching car seat he quickly grew to hate the stroller - as did I.

After much research we bought the Maclaren Volo Carbon Stroller with mesh backing (we live in Florida so the mesh was perfect for our climate) and I am sure I will never own another stroller.  I remember cringing as I spent the $100 but we now joke that it was the best $100 we ever spent.  It really was.

We have traveled all over the country with the stroller - it's lightweight, extremely collapsable and comes with a shoulder strap that was a genious addition.  The wheels don't stick like cheaper umbrella strollers, it can take a beating and still keep going.  At 4 years and 42 lbs it still carried my son without a squeek. (Ok we did WD-40 the wheels once in the 4 years we had it.) The mesh backing made cleaning the stroller a breeze.  It can easily be steered with one hand, and we personally loved the shape of the handles and the handle padding  - pushing other strollers feels so awkward now.  The basket underneath is incredibly handy and carries a surprising amount.  It folds easily with one hand and foot.  

My son doesn't use a stroller anymore but the Volo still looks and works perfectly so we are saving it for our next child.  

Bottom line, this stroller is worth every penny you pay for it.

The ONE and only complaint I have about the stroller is that it would be nice if the seat reclined for younger infants.  If you are thinking about purchasing this stroller for younger infants consider spending the extra $ for the model that does recline.  A sun visor might be something to consider too

product_name: Maclaren Volo Saffron Orange Stroller: Baby
title: Nearly perfect!
review_text: I love how easy this stroller is to use, the way it looks, the way it handles and drives, and most importantly my son LOVES to ride in it!  I say "nearly perfect" only because I wish it reclined.  But this doesn't seem to prevent my son from having a pleasant nap in it....I just think he'd be more comfortable if it reclined.  I'd keep everything else about it the same, and I would definitely recommend this stroller for someone who travels with her child as much as I do (once a month at least)

product_name: The First Years - Soothie 9 oz. Bottles 3 pk.: Baby
title: Good Bottles
review_text:
Over-all these are pretty good bottles. The only thing that I feel could use some improvement is the shape of the top of the bottle, it's a little bit too wide. Example:  When you get to end of feeding and have to tilt the bottle upward to get the last 1/2 ounce or so, the base of the nipple is actually touching babies nose. 

Other than that, these are GREAT bottles. They are resonably priced, never had any problems w/ leaking & absolutely LOVE that cap snaps onto bottom of bottle, GENIUS!

product_name: The First Years - Soothie 9 oz. Bottles 3 pk.: Baby
title: Quick ship!
review_text: The item came quickly and the bottles are nice but my baby won't convert:

product_name: The First Years - Soothie 9 oz. Bottles 3 pk.: Baby
title: WE LOVE SOOTHIES!!!
review_text:
Our baby would never take a paci if it weren't for soothies!! Yeahhhh soothie! Bottles are great.  We switched to the soothie bottle just because our son was confusing the nipple on his bottles and his paci.  We need him to keep taking his paci so we are thrilled to have the soothie bottle with the same nipple. No complaints, they work great. 

Not sure why the other reviewer only gave 4 stars...if you don't screw ANY bottle on tight enough, it leaks!  ...DUH!

product_name: DaVinci Emily Convertible baby Crib - Cherry: Baby
title: Beautiful!
review_text: This crib makes our nursery!  Every person that has seen the room comments on what a beautiful crib this is.  The wood is very thick and expensive looking for a very inexpensive price.  The crib is very sturdy when put together, and with no movable parts (the front piece doesn't lower) it is very safe for the baby.  Knowing that this crib will grow with my baby through toddler and childhood years is reassuring too.  I'm glad that I purchased this crib!  You can't beat the quality for the price

product_name: DaVinci Emily Convertible baby Crib - Cherry: Baby
title: Crib Looks Great,  Packaging needs more protection
review_text: I have got this crib last week, I have opened the package today and crib's headboard is damaged with big crack. Called Amazon about it hope to sort this  problem out earliest. I will keep posted about my Progress on this

product_name: DaVinci Emily Convertible baby Crib - Cherry: Baby
review_text: I bought this Crib for my 3 month old son. My wife said it arrived quickly and was in great shape! She put it together and says its good quality with the only probelm, being that is scratches easily.

product_name: DaVinci Emily Convertible baby Crib - Cherry: Baby
title: Very, very nice product
review_text: Easy to assemble, solid wood, no damages, nice color and good price.

product_name: DaVinci Emily Convertible baby Crib - Cherry: Baby
title: Nice valuable crib! Need appropriate service.
review_text:
The cherry wood itself is very great, however, the painting is easy to be scratched during delivery and installation. Both the packaging & delivery should be more careful.
The deliverer put it to my condo guard while I was at home, why not sent the huge heavy item directly to my door?

product_name: DaVinci Emily Convertible baby Crib - Cherry: Baby
title: cute and good price
review_text: We just ordered this crib last weekend and have already received it and put it together. It looks really great. However, when we received the box from UPS, it looked terrible and we were really afraid that the crib would be damaged.  It looks fine, although we did have to touch up a few places with a stain pen.  I would recommend that you inspect each piece carefully before putting the crib together.  Also, the directions that came with the crib said nothing about the washers that were included in the hardware. We just sort of had to figure out to use them with the bolts. SO, if you order this crib and it comes with washers, don't forget to put them in, because the directions won't tell you to!  We were impressed by how fast the crib arrived and the free shipping was great too.  It wasn't terribly difficult to put together, pretty sturdy, and I would say it was worth what we paid for it

product_name: DaVinci Emily Convertible baby Crib - Cherry: Baby
title: Beauty and quality at a reasonable price
review_text: Although we have yet to use this item (our baby is not due for another 2 months), I can say we are very impressed with it so far. It was in perfect shape when it shipped, the instructions were easy to follow, it was easy to build, and it looks beautiful. It's also very sturdy and seems well constructed. It's a very elegant addition to any nursery, and I love the cherry colour. Much more classy looking than many more expensive products. We also bought the Emily changing table and the Emily 4 drawer dresser, and are very impressed with both of those too.

product_name: DaVinci Emily Convertible baby Crib - Cherry: Baby
title: Beautiful crib at a great price!
review_text: I'm so glad we opted to go with this crib- not only did we get a great deal on it w/no shipping costs, but it's beautiful, easy to put together (I did it myself at 8 mos pregnant) and got to us quickly.  It's nice and sturdy w/a gorgeous dark cherry finish that matches our nursery.  Highly recommended :

product_name: JJ Cole Essentials Sling Style Backpack Diaper Bag In Pink Chocolate: Baby
title: Great Product
review_text: Wonderful product!! This is just what I needed. I don't want to carry a big diaper bag all the time. This is big enough to put 4-5 diapers, plus a changing clothes and wipes and the whole bunch of other stuff. I can also have my both hands free. I love it.

product_name: JJ Cole Essentials Sling Style Backpack Diaper Bag In Pink Chocolate: Baby
title: Perfect for Short Outings
review_text: I love this bag and use it every day. There is room for wipes and 3 or 4 diapers, snacks, mom's essentials... Great for short trips to the store or other short outings. Comfortable and easy to carry especially if you already have your hands full with more than one kid. If we are going somewhere for longer periods of time I do pack a larger bag though so we can fit a change of clothes, blanket, toys, etc

product_name: Mustela Extra Thick Cleansing Cloths: Baby
title: MOMMY'S BEST HELPER
review_text:
This wipes is the best. It smells good, non-alcoholic
and is perfect for even the most sensitive skin. Try
it! You won't regret

product_name: Mustela Extra Thick Cleansing Cloths: Baby
title: these smell so good!
review_text: the smell on these is wonderful. they are very soft and do not crumble and irritate like huggies wipes. the package is very convenient for the diaper bag too because it closes completely so the wipes don't dry out

product_name: 5 Second Rectal Thermometer: Baby
title: superior thermometer
review_text:
I LOVE this product and actually contacted the company to let them know.  Here is a copy of my communication to them:

"I just wanted to take a moment to thank you for making such a superior product.  As a mother to a 2 Â½ year old and an 11 week old, I own several thermometers and performed my fair share of temperature readings.  A few months ago I purchased your QuickRead digital thermometer to keep in my diaper bag as a spare.  After using the product a few times, I have decided to replace all other thermometers I own with more QuickReads.  From end to end, what a great product!  Here is what I love about it:
- Extremely quick readings
- The shape of the tip allows for perfect insertion
- Tip is also flexible, allowing for "wiggle room"
- Button is the perfect size and easy to trigger
- Most importantly, the readout faces the reader - not the tush it's reading!

A digital thermometer is a parent's necessity.  Unfortunately, the only way to find out which one works best is by trial and error.  I am so glad I finally what I consider to be the best one on the market, and I thought I'd let you know what a good job your company has done."

product_name: 5 Second Rectal Thermometer: Baby
title: I Love this Thermometer
review_text: I love this themometer! With my first child my husband always called me a hypochondriac stating I always thought my baby felt warm well with this thermometer it actually glows an flashes if your child does have a fever,and only takes a few seconds! I love this and have recommended it to others

product_name: Tiny Love Gymini Melody Maker: Baby
title: Excellent for little infants!
review_text:
This activity mat was expensive (I bought it full price at almost $60) but there is a lot of usage in it. I started using it with my baby when she was 2 months old, she enjoyed seeing the colorful toys above her. As she grew, she loved being on her tummy with the colorful mat, especially the crinkling leaf. The attached toys were excellent themselves and I used them to clip onto her carseat and crib. Only when she could finally get up and crawl did she tire of the mat. 
My only criticism is of the "musical" toy that dangles. It does have a switch on/off which is great. However, the volume of the music is LOUD! Many a dark night I tried to tiptoe past it and had a heart attack when I accidentally tapped the toy & the music blasted. ALso, the sun-mirror comes off easily and is hard to prop up. 
Again, this is well worth it and a well designed toy for any infant.

product_name: Medela Quick Clean Breastpump & Accessory Wipes 40 Pack: Baby
title: great for the busy working mom
review_text: I am a pharmacist and I usually don't get a scheduled lunch break, so I must pump whenever I get a free minute.  I work 10 hour shifts so I sometimes need to pump twice a day.  These wipes work great when in a hurry without access to the sterlizer or dishwasher.  I still sterilize the pump every night and morning before I go to work, but they have saved me lots of time during my lunch break so I can actually eat instead of trying to handwash and dry each piece at work

product_name: Medela Quick Clean Breastpump & Accessory Wipes 40 Pack: Baby
title: A life saver
review_text: I am a teacher, and I have very limited time and space in which to pump.  These wipes have saved me- one wipe can clean all the accessories for the Medela double pump.  There isn't a strong smell or nasty feel, either- as long as you can allow the pieces to sit and dry for at least 10 minutes, they are ready to go.  Obviously, it isn't as good as getting to a sink, but in my situation they have been perfect.  I would recommend having these on hand for an emergency even if you can usually wash your accessories every time

product_name: Kettler Kids Dining Chair-Blue: Baby
title: Not pretty but works great!
review_text: I was afraid to order this chair at first, too. But mine came in yesterday and I am ordering 4 more! It is very sturdy and is easy to put on the table. I was worried about the kids pushing it off from underneath with their feet, but it has some adjustments under there to secure it to the table. There is also a button on each side to fold down the screw adjustment and just slide it off the table. It also folds flat. This is great for my grandkids and we can always be assured of a clean chair for them when dining out! The colors aren't pretty, but it is washable

product_name: Superman 4-pc. Toddler Bedding Set: Baby
title: GREAT!
review_text: I received this very quickly and was thrilled to find it in excellent condition! My son loves his new Superman bed

product_name: Kidsline Zanzibar Window Drapes: Baby
title: Match just fine
review_text:
"...But they do match the ruffle on the diaper stacker, the border on the wall hangings and quilt, the trim on the hamper, etc. It is not as if there would be this one item with an odd color or pattern..."
Exactly what the previous reviewer has stated. These drapes go along with the Zanzibar set perfectly. We have two windows on either side of our son's nursery and both look really well fitted with these drapes and the Zanzibar window valances

product_name: Lascal 3G Buggy Board - Black: Baby
title: happy with buggy board
review_text: After doing a lot of research, we are pretty happy with this product.  We have a 4 year old, a 2 1/2 year old, a 1 year old, and one on the way so we were happy that there was a product out there that could help our 4 year old when she gets tired of walking and there is no room for her in the stroller:)  We attached it to our double stroller and it works fine.  It makes it a little heavier and awkward to fold up but overall we are pleased with this purchase

product_name: Lascal 3G Buggy Board - Black: Baby
title: Excellent for travel
review_text: This is great for toddlers when you travel.  I felt I got my money's worth (yes, it's pricey) from the airport parking garage to the first security checkpoint.  We used it throughout airports and on our vacation with our 3yr old (six month old in stroller).  It does make walking a little awkward if your stroller doesn't have real long handles, but it is not hard to accomodate overall.  Well worth it, especially if you don't want to end up carrying a toddler

product_name: Fisher-Price Corner Bath Cubby: Baby
title: Bath Cubby
review_text: This bath cubby is great. Its made very well, very durable and attrative. It holds ALOT of bath toys and drains the water out. I have had no problems with mold or meldew on the basket, bath toys or the corner of the tub. My 17 month loves to put his toys in and out of the basket while in the tub

product_name: Fisher-Price Corner Bath Cubby: Baby
title: Cute and works well too!
review_text: I just purchased this bath toy organizer and I love it!  It fits perfectly into the corner of our tub and holds many toys plus the shampoo and wash clothes.  I was hesitant to get this item because of some of the other reviews, but I think it is great and I have no regrets in buying it...I only wish I had bought it sooner

product_name: Fisher-Price Corner Bath Cubby: Baby
title: Holds a lot and stays in place
review_text: We haven't had any of the problems that other reviewers have.  We have regular square tile on our bath walls.  The basket holds several floating toys, plus a cup for dunking water, shampoo, wash cloths, etc.....  We love it

product_name: Finding Nemo No-Slip Bath Mat: Baby
title: Finding Nemo Bath Mat
review_text: I just love this, bright, cheery and something for baby to look at while bathing. Safety first, then good looks

product_name: Finding Nemo No-Slip Bath Mat: Baby
title: Good bath mat for baby
review_text: This mat does exactly what it's supposed to: it stays in place and keeps the baby from sliding in the bathtub.  And it's pretty cute too

product_name: Finding Nemo No-Slip Bath Mat: Baby
title: Finding Nemo No-Slip Bath Mat
review_text: What a perfect way to safely decorate my grandson's tub!  He thinks it's so cool

product_name: Combi Connection Infant Car Seat Night Rider: Baby
title: Highly recommended car seat!
review_text:
I had a Graco car seat for my first son.  He was always uncomfortable in it and he outgrew it by the time he was four months old. He was also uncomfortable in the accompanying stroller and I hated trying to get this heavy stroller in and out of my car.  The whole travel system was a waste of money. 

After a lot of research I bought the Combi Connection car seat with the Flash EX Universal Car Seat Carrier for my second son.  I have been very happy with both.  My second son is almost 10 months old and I'm still using this car seat.  He has been very comfortable in it, and I'm dreading having to give up the convenience of having him in an infant carrier. 

My son isn't exceptionally small.  He is light for his age - he's in the 25th percentile for weight, but he's tall - 90th for height.

I am completely shocked by the previous reviewer who thought this car seat was too small.

The only reason I gave this car seat 4 stars instead of 5 is because the canopy isn't very sturdy.  Other than that it is highly recommended

product_name: Storkcraft Beatrice Three Drawer Chest In Cherry: Baby
title: got it at JC Penny instead
review_text: I really liked this dresser (and the matching 5 drawer dresser) but I was hesitant to order it through Babies R Us.  I found it online at JC Penny.com, and found a free shipping code online as well (saved lots of $$ with that!).  Both pieces arrived in about two weeks, and in perfect condition.  My husband and I put the pieces together in about 2-3 hours and are very pleased with the quality considering the price.  I would recommend JC Penny if you really like this furniture.  I give JC Penny Five stars

product_name: SnugRide Infant Car Seat Base in Black: Baby
title: Graco carseat base
review_text:
This base and the Graco system in whole are great, however we did have to put a blanket under the base to get it to level up in both of our vehilce (a 2004 VW Jetta, and a 2002 Dodge Dakota).

Over all I would recomend it to friends and family

product_name: Evenflo Classic Glass Nurser System 8 Ounce/ 3 Pack: Baby
title: Utility Bottles
review_text:
These bottles are great for storing and heating breast milk. The standard opening they have fits the wife's breast pump (Almeda Purely Yours), and allows her to pump longer than the stock bottles that come with the pump.
I feel better heating milk in these glass bottles, and using plastic bottles to feed my son. Overall they are sturdy and come with a lot of old school nipples and caps.

product_name: Evenflo Classic Glass Nurser System 8 Ounce/ 3 Pack: Baby
title: A great product
review_text: I love the glass bottles,I now have peace of mind!  During the late night feedings my husband and I just place the glass bottles in the bottle warmer without fear of chemical contamination.  The only down side is that the glass bottles are heavier than the plastic;however, with time your baby will learn how to hold them!!

product_name: Evenflo Classic Glass Nurser System 8 Ounce/ 3 Pack: Baby
title: great product
review_text: if you're concerned about plastic bottles, this is an excellent alternative. too bad it's hard to find them in retail stores. it should be promoted more, no babies should be drinking out of plastic bottles that leach toxic chemicals anyway.

product_name: Evenflo Classic Glass Nurser System 8 Ounce/ 3 Pack: Baby
title: 8 oz. clear glass baby bottles (3pk)
review_text: They are good except being heavy due to glass design but I guess it is expected. My boy is developing arm muscles now from holding it for few months now. hahaha. Three in a pack is a very good idea, four could have been better though

product_name: Evenflo Classic Glass Nurser System 8 Ounce/ 3 Pack: Baby
title: tried and true
review_text: I love these glass bottles- the same ones my mother used in the 60's and I used in the 80's with my first baby and am using again with my new babies-twins! They just seem cleaner to me- they shine after being washed in the dishwasher.

product_name: Evenflo Classic Glass Nurser System 8 Ounce/ 3 Pack: Baby
title: Glass bottles are a healthier choice!
review_text: I have researched plastic bottles extensively.  They are known to leak a little cancer causing chemical into the baby's milk when they are heated.  I am not some wacky nut job who thinks everything gives you cancer, but when it comes to our children's health why take a chance.  I use these glass bottles at home with my daughter and strongly recommend them to my friends.  I know we can't protect are kids from everything, but I am going to do as much as I can for my children.

product_name: MOBI Floating Waterproof Digital Bath Thermometer w/ Alarm: Baby
title: Perfect!
review_text:
This is the best Baby bath thermometer we have used. It is very fast and accurate. Very simple, you take it from the base (duck's legs) and place it in the water. It tells the temperature and warns if it is COLD, HOT or ready for bath. Very simple, yet perfect!
We are highly satisfied and would absolutely recommend it

product_name: Storkcraft Beatrice Five Drawer Chest In Natural Stain: Baby
title: good buy
review_text: This drawer is one of the good buys I've made for my kids' room.  Easy to assemble.  I'm very happy with this product

product_name: Kiddopotamus & Co SwaddlemeÂ® Adjustable Infant Wrap Microfleece Large, Pink: Baby
title: Best wrap!
review_text: My daughter is almost 6 months old and slept through the whole night wearing her new Swaddleme. She normally wakes up frequently because she kicks off her blankets. But last night, she didn't wake up once! I'm definitely going to get another one these!

product_name: Kiddopotamus & Co SwaddlemeÂ® Adjustable Infant Wrap Microfleece Large, Pink: Baby
title: should come with every baby!
review_text: These swaddlers calm a crying baby during the day and help them sleep at night! The tighter you wrap the better they sleep! Thank you Swaddleme!!!!!

product_name: Kiddopotamus & Co SwaddlemeÂ® Adjustable Infant Wrap Microfleece Large, Pink: Baby
title: Ahhh... sleep!!
review_text: I swear by these swaddlers! I put my baby in it and she sleeps SOOOO well! It is also easy to calm her when we place her in her swaddler! Great item

product_name: Kiddopotamus & Co SwaddlemeÂ® Adjustable Infant Wrap Microfleece Large, Pink: Baby
title: Essential Baby Item
reviewer: Melanie Mendelson "I Fired My Boss! => www.GoForYourDreams.com"
review_text:
When my daughter was born, I didn't know about swaddling, and it would take me HOURS to get her to sleep! I would feed or rock her in my arms until she falls asleep, then put her in her crib... and she'd flail her arms, wake up and cry, and I had to start all over! What a nightmare! 

Then I figured out that since her arms wake her, it would make sense to wrap her in something so she couldn't move them as much... so I started wrapping her in regular receiving blankets. It worked! It became much easier to get her to sleep. But then she wiggled out of those receiving blankets and wake up again. 

When she was a little over a month old, somehow I came across SwaddleMe blankets on the Internet and immediately bought it. It worked great! It was so easy to wrap my daughter in it, and it stayed put. My daughter started sleeping so much better! 

I wish I found those blankets sooner - it would've saved me from so many sleepless nights! 

2 years later, my son was born, and thankfully I already knew about those blankets from the start. He goes to sleep great in the SwaddleMe blanket! Out of curiosity, I tried to put him to sleep without this blanket, and his arms wake him right away - exactly the same as my daughter! 

I consider this blanket one of the most important baby items you could buy. It should be a must for a new mother who wants to get some sleep

product_name: Kiddopotamus & Co SwaddlemeÂ® Adjustable Infant Wrap Microfleece Large, Pink: Baby
title: Works wonders on a squirmer...
review_text:
We have been swaddling our little girl since birth. We started off using just the receiving blanket but as she got bigger she would escape from it or kick her legs free and it would end up like a donut around her waist by morning. She still at 4 months sleeps better with her arms restrained so we have continued swaddling and the SwaddleMe is perfect for that. It's very easy to get her into but doesn't constrict her legs as much as the blanket used to.
My only complaint with the product is that there needs to be a large area for the velcro bears to attach to. To wrap it tight enough to hold her arms leaves the bottom bear with nothing to attach to. She may just be on the smaller side for this Large version but she had definately outgrown the Small one because she could no longer straighten her legs in it

product_name: Kiddopotamus & Co SwaddlemeÂ® Adjustable Infant Wrap Microfleece Large, Pink: Baby
title: Unbelievable!
review_text: I received this as a gift for my shower. I had forgotten all about it. My baby was extremely collicky, and wouldn't sleep at night. I would be up until 3am EVERY NIGHT! After about a month, I was desperate...I pulled out the swaddle me and gave it a shot. Well...she slept all night, I jumped out of bed at 7am and ran into her room, I thought something was wrong! She was SNORING!!! Had I known that this product was a Godsend, I would've paid $100 bux for it!!! She is 4 months old now, and I've been swaddling her for the last 3 months, she sleeps 8-10 hours straight!! I just wish they made it in size medium. She's in the large now, and it's a bit big. She manages to get her arms out. But I love it anyway!!! She'll grow into it. BUY IT!

product_name: Kiddopotamus & Co SwaddlemeÂ® Adjustable Infant Wrap Microfleece Large, Pink: Baby
title: The best of all the Swaddle Me fabrics
review_text: Within the first two days home after the hospital, I realized I needed more of these!  So, my parents went out and bought a couple of each (cotton, mircrofleece, and flannel).  My baby definitely preferred the microfleece.  It fits the most snugly of the three and didn't shrink like the flannel one.  The fabric has a little give and she wasn't able to break free like she was with the cotton one.  The cotton ones are also a bit larger in circumference.  Overall, the Swaddle Me is very soothing and it greatly improved the quality of sleep for baby and me

product_name: Kiddopotamus & Co SwaddlemeÂ® Adjustable Infant Wrap Microfleece Large, Pink: Baby
title: This is wonderful!
review_text: This is wonderful!  My 3 month old has been sleeping 8-9 hours a night for the last month or so thanks to this!  We had the smaller one when she was newborn & thank goodness they make it larger.  She always seemed to big to swaddle in blankets, she would work herself free but this is very soothing to her. I would recommend it to any new parent

product_name: Parents of Invention Ultimate Baby Wrap- Green: Baby
title: Very Useful !!
review_text:
I traveled alone from USA to Venezuela with my newborn on this carrier and was very helpful to have my hands free and the baby slepping the most of the time. 
In the city, is the best to go out alone with your little one.

product_name: Parents of Invention Ultimate Baby Wrap- Green: Baby
title: The Best baby wrap ever!
review_text: I just had my third child and had to buy all new things, because I got rid of everything after my second child.  I had a sling with the other two, but instead of getting the same one, I looked at the new ones, and this is far better than the old.  I like the lighter fabric and its easy to fold up and stuff in the diaper bag.  You do need to watch the DVD, but with a little practice anyone, even husbands can use it!!  My son is 11 weeks old and has loved it since day one.  When he is fussy, we put him in the sling and he instantly get quiet.  This is the best one for back support also, I think

product_name: Parents of Invention Ultimate Baby Wrap- Green: Baby
title: Great Product!
review_text: Wonderful. Very easy to put on and my daughter loves it, she falls asleep everytime.  It is the most comfortable carrier I have tried as it doesn't dig into my back.

product_name: Kidsline Zanzibar Fitted Crib Sheet: Baby
title: Great Fit and Durability
review_text: I have the Zanzibar Bedding Set which I love.  I bought a few extra crib sheets to have handy.  They crib sheets are beige and white checkered, just simple.  They are fitted sheets and fit well on a standard crib mattress.  I have washed them a few times and they still look good as new

product_name: The First Years - Clean Air Diaper Disposal System: Baby
title: BEST Diaper Holder with NO Odors ! !
review_text:
We had a Diaper Genie, it's a total waste of money and plastic. The Diaper Genie was so hard to use and didn't do anything to stop odors. My son's room smelled as if we threw the diapers in an open garbage. We replaced it with THE FIRST YEARS CLEAN AIR DIAPER DISPOSAL SYSTEM. It's awesome!

The greatest thing about it is that it can store about 6-7 days of my son's diapers without NO yucky odors. WOW!! It has a "clean air" venting system which is totally 100% silent. I actually though it was broken because it made NO noise! It runs on D batteries that last about 9 months. There is a little light that briefly flashes to let you know that the lid is secure and the vent system is working. It uses regular tall kitchen garbage bags--saving us money. 

The only drawback is that occasionally you will shut the lid and it won't fully secure. You'd know that by two clues, the first being that the little green light won't flash. Later you'll get the second clue--your baby's room will start to smell! I now check to see if the light is on each time I put a diaper in to make sure the lid is secure.

We love this product so much. Our son's room smells clean with no poopy odors, and we save money by using our own tall kitchen bags. It's also very easy to change--no confusing bag twisting.

I highly recommend using this diaper holder, it's the best

product_name: The First Years - Soothie Bottle Starter Set: Baby
title: great bottle
review_text:
These bottles actually came with my pump and I had never used them. My daugther made it clear very early that she preferred me to a bottle and refused all bottles and pacifiers. She does know how to use a sippy, and will take one no problem. Recently, I pumped some milk to take with her when her grandmother was going to watch her for me. This is the first time I had pumped since she was really little, and I had gotten rid of all the bottles that fit the pump, besides these. I had meant to give them to my sister but forgot about having them. I pumped into the bottle to take with, and Mom transferred it to a sippy there. When it was time to go home, there was still a lot left and it was transferred back to the bottle to come home. It was placed in the fridge and I had planned on giving it to my older daughter today so it wouldn't go to waste. When I went to get it, I could't find it and I discovered Kathrynn sucking away at it. She had almost totally finished the three ounces. One of her siblings had decided to be helpful by giving her the bottle and an oatmeal cookie. I was floored seeing her actually using a bottle. And it wasn't because she was desperate. It hadn't been that long since she had nursed. 

She absolutely loves this bottle. I tried again later with a bit of pear juice and she took it no problem although she pushed away any other nipples I handed to her. I had no problems with this leaking. I'll still stick with sippys. I have more of those, and it just seems silly to go buy a bunch of bottles and nipples when I would be taking her off bottles in four months anyway. But I definitely recomend them. My sisters little guy really likes them too, which is why I had meant to give them to her. These are the only bottles she uses, and she does use formula.

product_name: The First Years - Soothie Bottle Starter Set: Baby
title: Great Set
review_text: My daughter loves these bottles, they are the same as her pacifier and they work very well. I have seen a few complaints about the vents leaking, but really that happens with all bottles that have vents and these arent nearly as bad as the avent bottles. I am glad I bought these

product_name: The First Years - Soothie Bottle Starter Set: Baby
title: Easy for Breastfed Babies
review_text:
Like the other moms who have reviewed this product, my son had difficulties with the Avent bottles. I have what seems to be a million Avent bottles from my first pregnancy and my newest son could not handle them.  He would choke, spit, up, have gas, and much of the milk leaked from the sides of his mouth - soaking him and who ever was feeding him!  

My son loved his soothie paci (it's the ONLY one he would take), so I decided to try the bottles.  He has absolutely no problems switching between the breast and these bottles.  I haven't had any leaking problems as mentioned  by other moms.

product_name: The First Years - Soothie Bottle Starter Set: Baby
title: Soothie set
review_text:
I nurse my daughter, but she supplements with formula and takes a pacifier too.  The lactation consultant suggested the Soothie products to improve my daughter's latch because of the long round nipple shape that's more natural for nursing babies.  It's too soon to see if it made a difference, but my daughter LOVES the soothie bottles and paci's now!  It took weeks before she'd take a Mam and over a week before she'd successfully drink from a Gerber bottle, but she took to Soothies instantly and in 5 mins or less prefered them to the products she'd been using for months!  They're so much easier for her to suck and hold in her mouth.  The price is great too, about 1/2 the price of the same set with Avent products.  

My 2 complaints are: 1) the leaking bottles and 2) the pacifier looks weird and doesn't attach to a pacifier keeper.  The leaking can be fixed by getting the part where the rim of the bottle meets the nipple wet to create a full seal.  Also, it helps to "swirl" the formula to mix instead of "shaking" it... it takes a bit longer, but you end up with less mess and less bubbles

product_name: Safety 1st Simple Step Diaper Pail: Baby
title: Not for cloth diapers that soak
review_text: Someone wrote this is good for cloth diapers. Only if you put them in dry. If you put water (with additive of your choice) to put your diapers in, this is dangerous: babies (ie ones old enough to get about and pull themselves up) have drowned in diaper pails. Esp if they step on the front and the lid pops open and they try to reach inside. headfirst. Only use a diaper pail that latches solidly closed if you are going to put in cloth diapers that you soak. For dry diapers of cloth or disposable variety this is a great buy

product_name: Safety 1st Simple Step Diaper Pail: Baby
title: Best Diaper Pail!!!
review_text: I'm extremely impressed with this diaper pail. It keeps the odors in.  I've read some reviews that complain about the smell when opening the diaper pail - but as soon as you close it, it disappears.  It's not rocket science.  Absolutely worth your ten bucks!!!  And you can use your own grocery bags or trash bags.  Just fabulous!!!

product_name: JJ Cole Toddler Urban Bundleme - Diva: Baby
title: Keeps Cydney warm and cozy!!!
review_text: I love this bundle me, prevents me from taking a jacket and blanket for Cydney and thats one less thing to carry aroun

product_name: Kidsline Zanzibar Valance: Baby
title: Very Versatile!!!
review_text: I bought this valance to go in my nursery and didn't know what to do when I got home & saw how big it was. We decided to make a cornice board and stretch the fabric over it. It turned out great..you can see all of the animals and I had extra fabric left over to do other things with in the nursery

product_name: Kidsline Zanzibar Valance: Baby
title: Versatile!
review_text: This valance is great!  I have 2 smaller windows in my baby girl's room and was able to cut the valance, sew the edges and make it fit both windows!  It hangs straight down so you are able to see all the animals and I didn't even have to cut an animal in half.  I have gotten so many compliments on this pattern - it's just the best for either a boy or girl's room.

product_name: Kidsline Zanzibar Valance: Baby
title: Tip for hanging your valance
review_text: The Zanzibar valance is adorable! We hung ours up this weekend and because the valance is much wider than our window, some of the animals weren't visible.. we took the valance down and stuffed it with bunched up tissue paper. It now looks great and you can see all of the animals! We also purchased the matching drapes which complete the look

product_name: Kidsline Zanzibar Valance: Baby
title: Great accessory for a Zanzibar nursery!
review_text: We love the look and feel of this valance!  We have a double window in our nursery and were concerned that we'd have to buy an additional valance, but one was plenty.  Highly recommended.

product_name: Kidsline Zanzibar Valance: Baby
title: Beautiful Valance
review_text:
I actually received this valance in the Zanzibar bed set.  But, if you need to purchase another one for an extra window in the nursery - do not hesitate.  This is a beautiful valance and actually has the same lovely fabrics (including suede like fabric) & textured animals as the bed skirt, bumper, & quilt.  I have noticed other bed sets (even the expensive ones) where the valances are quite plain.

The valance measure's around 90 inches wide.  But, is meant to have a bunched up look so it looks great on narrower windows.  Also, beige or sage colored drapes or sheers would be a great complement to this valance to shield the nursery from day light during nap time

product_name: Power Strip Cover: Baby
title: Love this!
review_text: Great babyproofing idea -- my 16 month old has not been able to open this cover.  Additionally, I think it actually looks better (cleaner) now that the cover is on the power strip.

product_name: Boppy 24/ 7 Body Pillow - White/ Tan: Baby
title: Couldn't have lived without it!
review_text: After having sleepless nights listening to my husband snore I was on a mission to find something to help me sleep while pregnant.  I found this pillow at Target and have been sleeping soundly ever since.  A MUST HAVE if you pregnant!It's a little expensive but worth every penny!

product_name: Boppy 24/ 7 Body Pillow - White/ Tan: Baby
title: Bulky, but so comfy!
review_text: This is a must-have item if you're pregnant and having trouble sleeping through the night.  I loved how it kept my head, spine, and legs in alignment--and relieved the pressure from my back when I rested my belly on it.  For moms-to-be who are having difficulty getting comfortable on the couch, you can prop the pillow behind your back--and even bring one half onto your lap as a make-shift cushion for a laptop or magazine

product_name: Boppy 24/ 7 Body Pillow - White/ Tan: Baby
title: My wife loves hers
review_text:
Hy wife was having a hard time sleeping while pregnant. One night as I watched her toss and turn I decided to do soemthing for her. I went to Target and bought her the boppy body pillow. That night she slpet sound for the first time in over a month.
She drags the thing from room to room in the house, she lays on it to watch tv and to sleep.
It does take up some room in the bed, but it is well worth me having a little less room for her to sleep sound.
Also a few times I have stolen it and used it while I lay on the ground and watch football. It is very comfy.

I have never been a pregnant woman, but from what my wife tells me this is a must have

product_name: Boppy 24/ 7 Body Pillow - White/ Tan: Baby
title: I Would NOT Have Survived Without This!
review_text: As any pregnant woman knows, at some point during gestation it becomes nearly impossible to sleep comfortably. When you can't sleep on your back, you can't sleep on your stomach, and your only choice is to balance on your side with your belly slowly pulling you off balance, your body actually gets pretty tired. After getting very little, uncomfortable sleep for some weeks, I searched desperately for relief. I intended to purchase the snooggle full length body/pregnancy pillow since they had it on Target online where my baby registry was. Some time passed and I decided to go straight to Target in person and get the snoogle only to find it was not there. BUT, the Boppy pillow WAS and I got it right away. I have to say that it is one of the BEST products I bought during my pregnancy. I would not have had a good nights sleep without it. Some people complain that the preggo pillows they have bought take up too much room in the bed, but this one is nicely shaped to hug your body and cushion where it is needed without too much extra bulk. The slipcover that comes with it is very pretty and easy to take off to wash. It also comes with a zippable pillowcase that you can fold the whole thing into to make one nice round pillow. I am still using this pillow after my son was born, since it folds nicely in different ways and makes a nice pillow just to recline on. Definitely a MUST HAVE for any pregnant woman! You WON'T regret it

product_name: Compass Light & Portable Travel System: Baby
title: so far so good
review_text: I bought this stroller for my baby girl I haven't used it yet my wife will be due in a month from now but everything came in perfect conditions no broken pieces also I got it for $130.00 with a 60% off good deal , I don't know how it is using it on the streets but I come back and share my experience.

product_name: Once Upon A Potty Gift Box With Song Audio Cd: Baby
title: A great potty chair!
review_text: I bought this potty chair for my son who is 21 months old. He really likes the chair, but really isn't excited about the sing-along CD. I had to buy another CD for him, to me it wasn't a CD that kids could follow and sing too. But the potty chair was really nice and my son got adjusted to it really well

product_name: Once Upon A Potty Gift Box With Song Audio Cd: Baby
title: We love this potty!

product_name: Once Upon A Potty Gift Box With Song Audio Cd: Baby
title: Love the sleek new design after years of potty chairs.
review_text:
To Target - this is a re-do of review I just sent. Please use this one instead as I did not explain it right the first time:  
  
 Love the sleek new non-potty design, and it gives more of a sense of privacy. No wonder kids did not want to sit on the old-fashioned chair ones. The different size measurements info is informative but need to know in liquid measurement how much it would safely hold.

product_name: Once Upon A Potty Gift Box With Song Audio Cd: Baby
title: Great new design after years of chair potties - Finally!
review_text: Love the sleek new non-potty design, and it gives more of a sense of privacy. No wonder kids did not want to sit on the old-fashioned ones. The different measurements info is informative but how deep in inches is the most important part of the potty, the bowl?

product_name: Imse Vimse Bumpy Soft Cloth Diaper Cover - Medium (15-22lbs): Baby
title: Good diaper cover for the price
review_text: Keeps clothes dry, holds in everything. Breathable & affordable. Easily washable as well

product_name: Bummis Whipser Pant: Medium (15-30 lbs).: Baby
title: Just like old-fashioned rubber pants.
review_text: These are super! Bought several pairs for each of my daughters for their baby showers and they loved them. They launder great, last long, and provide nearly the same over the diaper protection as regular ordinary rubber pants do.

product_name: DaVinci Emily Convertible baby Crib - White: Baby
title: Beautiful and solid crib!!
review_text: This is a great buy! Easy to assemble and looks gorgeous. One of the most important things - it is very solid.

product_name: DaVinci Emily Convertible baby Crib - White: Baby
title: Great Product
review_text: It was easy to put together and came faster than expected. The price matches the quality. Overall, I was very impressed with the crib.

product_name: DaVinci Emily Convertible baby Crib - White: Baby
title: Love the crib
review_text: I spent hours online and in stores comparing cribs for my grandson.  Was very hesitant to purchase something this big online, especially after reading some reviews about it coming damaged, but when I saw the price, and cheap shipping, I figured it was worth a try. I am so glad I did.   The crib arrived in time, in perfect shape, packed very secure, with not a scratch.  The directions were easy to follow, all the parts were included, and we had it up in about an hour.  (Even for two old grandparents.)  My daughter spent almost $500 on her crib, and I think this one is more sturdy and better looking.  Haven't had the chance to put our little guy in it yet, but so far I believe we will be very happy with it.  I do plan on getting the round teether covers for the top rails, since I don't want him scratching it up with his teeth! Would recommend it to anyone, especially at this price.

product_name: DaVinci Emily Convertible baby Crib - White: Baby
title: so far, so good
review_text: This crib was easy to assemble and it is very pretty. I like how versatile it is for the price. I put it together by myself and 6 mos. pregnant in an hour.  It was very easy to do.  One concern I had was that some of the pieces were missing paint in some spots; nothing extrememly obvious that wasn't eventually covered up by the mattress. I have several more weeks before I get to actually try it out, so my rating is based on looks and assembly only. I am confident, however, that it will stand the test of time..

product_name: BreathableBaby™ Crib Bumper - Sage Gingham: Baby
title: love it & very safe too!
review_text: I love this bumper, it keeps my son arms and legs inside the crib and gives me piece of mind from SIDS. It also matches my Pottery barn Green Gingham pattern perfectly

product_name: BreathableBaby™ Crib Bumper - Sage Gingham: Baby
title: Peace of mind for parents - and not bad lookin'!
review_text:
I searched online for sage colored crib bedding for weeks before my daughter was born and finally settled on something close. I was satisfied that it matched well enough to maintain the cuteness of her nursery (of utmost importance) and was affordable at the same time. I had seen the breathable bumpers but opted for the "cuter" bedding, confident that my child would be safe.
     
My daughter started sleeping through the night at 8 weeks which meant I was not going into her room for 7-9 hours at a time, depending on the night.  Even though I swaddle her for sleeping, she still manages to travel around her crib during the night as well as during longer naps.
     
One morning when I heard her wake up, I went into her room to find that she had wiggled her way down to the southwest corner of her crib and her face was pressed up against the "adorable, nursery-matching, affordable" crib bumper.  I jerked that bumper out of the bed and ran down to order a breathable bumper.  
    
Since I put it on her crib she has been pressed up against it two or three times and is able to breath.  I am delighted because I think it's actually cuter than the one I had before and I don't have to worry at all (at least about that!).  It's a very clean look and the green gingham matches the crib skirt I got perfectly.

The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because of the fit.  It comes in 2 pieces:  one for the side of the crib that moves up and down and one for the other 3 sides.  This leaves 2 openings, one at each end of the front of the crib, that an arm or leg could potentially get stuck in.  It hasn't been a problem for us yet as she has quit the southwest travelling and now just spins in place. However, I would much rather risk a let getting stuck than having a suffocated baby.  I have no regrets about buying this and am advising all of my pregnant friends to consider the breathable option over the puffy ones

product_name: BreathableBaby™ Crib Bumper - Sage Gingham: Baby
title: Safe Bumper
review_text: Keeps your baby from getting a foot stuck through the side of the crib, but still fits tightly and safely

product_name: Storkcraft Beatrice Armoire Chest In Cherry: Baby
title: Excellent Value
review_text:
My husband and I are very happy with this armoire!  We have a small apartment with little storage space and this armoir is the perfect size providing loads of extra storage.  I read other reviews so I knew it didn't have a hanging bar, but I knew I wasn't going to be hanging clothes.  One thing I didn't expect was that it was white inside, but it makes it easier to see.  We had it put together within an hour, instructions were easy to follow.  A solid piece of furniture well worth $240. 
Jessica,NY

product_name: Storkcraft Beatrice Armoire Chest In Cherry: Baby
title: A nice addition to our kitchen
reviewer: B. McCarthy "Engineer, CERT, Amateur Radio Operator"
review_text: We needed more pantry space and this was a cheap option to get it.  The first one came damaged and missing parts, but they replaced it so that is not a problem.  The bottom of the drawers is weak, and the drawer facces come off too easily, but I can add an angle to strengthen that joint and use the drawers for lighter foods so I am happy with the product.  The color is wonderfull

product_name: On the Go Potty: Baby
title: Great idea.  We love it.
review_text:
I bought this for my son a couple of years ago.  We used it lots when we were out, especially when he was potty training and just couldn't wait.  It's wonderful.  Just wish it was easier to find the liners.  

Another reviewer said there are sharp edges.  Ours doesn't have any sharp edges.  It does collapse, if the legs aren't snapped up properly; but otherwise isn't a problem.

Our daughter is potty training right now and we have it ready for her whenever she needs it.  It will also be great for our upcoming car trip

product_name: On the Go Potty: Baby
title: SUPER-POTTY!!!
review_text:
What a Godsend this has been.  Our daughter is 3 years old and we take this thing everywhere!  Sure, we keep Potty-toppers with us, but sometimes that just isn't enough.  This On The Go Potty is far better than any porta-potty or gross outdoor park restroom.  

We have used this potty at the park, while making rounds at build/construction sites, at baseball games, even in the parking garage of our hockey rink!  Our daughter can use it just about anywhere.  It's small size allows her to use it discreetly and comfortably.  

If you EVER venture more than 30 seconds from a clean toilet, you NEED this.  Then you'll wonder how you ever got by without it

product_name: BedBugz Portable Bed Bolster in Blue: Baby
title: worked for my convertable crib/toddler bed!
review_text: I purchased this product because I had a crib that converted to a toddler bed, but it didn't come with any kind of railing to keep my little guy from falling out.  Since the toddler bed uses the crib mattress, I was a little concerned about the large size of the bolster--it covers the entire length of the mattress--but my son figured out how to climb right over it to get into and out of bed.  It does pop off the mattress sometimes when he is getting in or out, but it isn't too difficult to strap it back on when I tuck him in.  I couldn't find any other kind of railing that fit my son's bed, so the BedBugz saved me from just having to pile pillows on the floor next to the bed

product_name: Foldaway Portable Crib – Natural: Baby
title: Satisfied
review_text: The item arrived in a timely manner and as advertised.  I am happy with the purchase

product_name: Foldaway Portable Crib – Natural: Baby
title: Very useful crib
review_text: We love this crib - we looked at several bassinettes and pack-n-plays because we wanted to have our baby in our room with us for the first few months before transitioning her to her big crib in her room, but we also wanted something versatile that could be used for her to play in (we have hard wood floors and I wanted something I could push around the house from room to room so she could be with me).  This crib is so much more attractive than pack-n-plays but functional and lasts so much longer than other cradles or bassinettes.  One of the biggest advantages is that it fits through doorways, which the pack-n-play does not, and I had wanted something I could roll around from room to room.  This was useful when she was a newborn and we wanted to keep her in the room with us, or just push her to the next room where we could hear her.  I also plan to use it to roll around the house when she is older and is using it to play in.  The nice thing about it is that it works just like a regular crib with the side that lowers and the mattress level which has two settings.  The other reviewer is right, you can push it up to your bed if you want a co-sleeper type of bed, and you could even lower the side down for easy reach of the baby.   I have not used it this way but it would be the perfect thing if my baby got sick.  Tho other thing I love about this crib is that as a sleeper or play area, it lasts much longer than a bassinnett or cradle - as long as a pack n play- I believe up to 50 pounds.  Finally, it is really nice looking, and since we have it in our master bedroom, I wanted something that would be cute and not bulky or would stand out too much.  This one is really attractive.  Negatives:  The mattress is pretty wimpy, which is why I gave this 4 stars.  But she, at just 6 months, is still sleeping on it at night and seems to be very comfortable in it.  For the next baby, I will probably look around for another mattress.  The other negative is that the crib does not travel too well - unlike the pack-n-play.  It does fold up for easy storage, but unless you have a minivan or SUV, it is still pretty large to store in a trunk - it does not fit into our volvo 4-door car trunk.  I would also recommend buying one of the port-a-crib bumper pad sets (around 40-50.00) from Babies R Us because they fit this crib the best.  I bought the 15.00 Koala Kids bumper pad and it is too big and buckles around the bed, so I only recently started using the bumper pad for fear that she would press up against it at night.  But you need a bumper pad with the crib as they get older because they start sticking their legs and arms out the slats while asleep.  Nice crib - good choice.

product_name: Avent ISIS Breast Pump with Disposable Nurser: Baby
title: I like it alot.
review_text: I received this as a gift at my baby shower. I had 2 pumps from the hospital and 1 pump from WIC. The Avent one is the one that I liked the best and I am still using it. It's small and easy to use. It's also nice because you can attach a bottle or the throw away containers, or use the collapsible liners it comes with. I don't have to pump a lot or often, so it has been perfect for me.

product_name: Avent ISIS Breast Pump with Disposable Nurser: Baby
title: Wonderful!!!
review_text: I used the medela hospital grade electric pump and also the manual and always had a hard time expressing enough milk to relieve my engorgement let alone feed my infant while I was away. Received this pump as a gift and wouldn't use an electric again if givent the chance. I love this pump! I am able to express enough milk for her feeding in about 15-20min. I have no discomfort like I did with the medela. Very easy to assemble once you figure it out the first time, easy to clean (using microwavable steam clean bags are great), very compact. After reading the reviews about the flimsy neck I now tighten the pump to the bottles using the pump base as to avoid breakage. Good luck!!! I very highly recommend this pump

product_name: Avent ISIS Breast Pump with Disposable Nurser: Baby
title: Awesome and efficient!
reviewer: Tonya N. Nemcovsky "Mother of 2 beautiful girls under 2!"
review_text: I love this pump! Letdown occurs within thirty seconds and I can pump several ounces in about ten to fifteen minutes. I haven't yet fed my baby with the disposable bottle but I do feed her from the regular avent bottles. She had her first bottle at 2 weeks and she goes from the avent bottles to breast with no problem. I do agree though that milk leaks from the corner of her mouth, but baby's are messy anyways so I don't think that is a big deal. I would recomend this pump to any mother! I pump when her father watches her when I have appointments as well as when I go shopping so that I can feed her in the store quicker

product_name: Avent ISIS Breast Pump with Disposable Nurser: Baby
title: Wonderful!
review_text: I love this pump.. I am a first time mom and wanted to breastfeed, but I work 3 nights a week and would need to express milk for my baby.  I read all the reviews and wanted to try the ISIS since it isnt as pricey as the medela. I have had the best experience with this pump.  One thing to note is that to get a comfortable & good suction you have to get the cushion petal thing wet and leave it wet when you put it on the pump.. My baby is now 3 months old and still exclusively receiving breastmilk thanks to the ISIS

product_name: Lazy Susan Cabinet Lock (1/pk): Baby
title: Works Great!!!
review_text: A bit tough to get used to  - but works great at keeping kids out of the cabinet

product_name: Kidsline Zanzibar Rug - Animals: Baby
title: RUG MAT
review_text: Hey people!  There are things called rug mats!  Any rug will "scoot around" on hard wood unless you have a mat under it.  If that is your only complaint, go spend the 9.99 it would take to get one

product_name: Kidsline Zanzibar Rug - Animals: Baby
title: great accessory!
review_text: The Zanzibar rug is a great accessory to the nursery! We have wall to wall carpet in the room and have placed this rug in front of the dresser. It's soft and very cute! We highly recommend

product_name: Protect-a-Bub Single Canopy UPF 50 Sunshade - Navy: Baby
title: Good product so far
review_text: This has been a life saver to protect my babies lily white skin from the hot Florida sun. The only draw back I can see so far is that it kind of makes her stroller hot like a tent.  Otherwise it has been great and allowed us to go for daily walks in the beautiful weather and get some fresh air.

product_name: 11796 10' Rail Net Mesh Guard: Baby
title: Don't use the eye screws!
review_text: We installed railnet on our large deck and found a better way to attach it.  Rather than using the strings and eye screws that came with it we bought some clear plastic zip ties from the hardware store (electrical department).  They're much quicker to install and probably easier to remove.  Better yet, we won't have 1000 little holes in our wood

product_name: 11796 10' Rail Net Mesh Guard: Baby
title: works well in loft area
review_text: We actually bought this from the babies r us store and found it to cheaper here.  So far, it works well in our loft area.  We need to buy another one though, as it wasn't long enough (our store only carried one).  My husband installedin one night and the nice thing is that it blends well into our white stairs, you barely notice it's there.  Haven't let the baby play up there yet, but it's always nice to know it will be safe when that time comes!  Now if only I can find a gate that will work for our uneven stair top

product_name: 11796 10' Rail Net Mesh Guard: Baby
title: I finally solved a tricky problem!
review_text: I have a contemporary home. The front stairs to the second floor are slotted w/spaces in between plus metal tubular hand rails with spaces  and a landing with the same hand rail.  We moved in when my children were much older.  Suddenly, I have a two year old grandchild and one on the way.  I panicked.  What to do about safety.  Glass or pexiglass would have taken too long to install and very costly.  Suddenly I saw the ad for the railnet.  While it is probably easier to put it on a straight opening, we were successful in figuring out how to string the netting on an angle.  I feel so much better knowing that children will not be able to fall through the railing.  We plan on putting one under the stair slats as well.  I highly recommend this product.  It is inexpensive, simple and strong.

product_name: 11796 10' Rail Net Mesh Guard: Baby
title: Great Product
review_text: I bought this product to keep my 10 month old safe upstairs and I love it.  It was very easy to put up and I stapled the bottom part to the floor and the carpet hides the staples.  It looks neater and more secure.  Same with one of my walls, and when I'm done with it, I'll put a little plaster in the holes and repaint the area. I'm very pleased

product_name: 11796 10' Rail Net Mesh Guard: Baby
title: Safety is #1
review_text: This product serves its purpose very well.  It may not be the prettiest thing, but it keeps children safe and is very versatile.  You can adjust the height and length by folding the ends up, and it is pretty easy to install

product_name: 11796 10' Rail Net Mesh Guard: Baby
title: Nice Idea
review_text: I like the net, becasue it does what it says it does. It may not be pretty, but isn't all childproofing stuff pretty tacky looking? It is worth it to feel safe to have this, especially because without it I would have a pretty nasty fall possibility, onto tile floor

product_name: Summer Infant Secure Surround Playsafe Play Yard Extension Kit: Baby
title: Expanding on a great idea
review_text:
I purchased the two panel extension kit for the Summer Secure Surround gate system which attached easily and has made a great idea even better.
My granddaughter has more than enough room to play and not feel as though
she is being caged in.  This summer it will be easy to bring her outside to play and not worry and watch every second we are out there.  The system is tall enough to be useable for years and when the good weather comes we can think about the other attachments (shade umbrella, etc.) available.

product_name: Summer Infant Secure Surround Playsafe Play Yard Extension Kit: Baby
title: Hard To Find Accessory
review_text: This was a much needed and welcome addition to our existing Summer Secure Surround Gate.  We actually use this for a dog that we have who had a major surgery on his leg and needed to be "penned up" while he recovered.  The extra two panels were advertised on the box but I could only find them here.  Price was fair and shipping was, too. Arrived in a timely fashion.  They came in a plain box that was not descriptive but they are true Summer product and work well.  Great for growing children, pets, etc.  Thanks for having 'everything' Amazon

product_name: Peg Perego Prima Pappa High Chair: Baby
title: Great Quality Highchair
review_text:
This is our second highchair. We owned the evenflow discovery highchair and found it to have many problems, so we were forced to buy a better product.
This chair is worth the price. Our daughter is very tall, but at 23 months she still uses this highchair with no problems.
PROS: Vinyl seat-makes for easy cleanup
      Safety harness is superior
      Extra tray is very convienent 
      Folds up nicely and has locking wheels
      Seat moves up and down
CONS: The release tabs for the tray are easy to break. If you don't properly push them in or out they will snap right off and your tray will no longer lock in place.

product_name: Peg Perego Prima Pappa High Chair: Baby
title: We Love this High Chair!!!
review_text: We bought this same high chair 10 years ago when my first daughter was born and we absolutely loved it!! At the time,the only reason we bought it was because they had it in all white and we didn't want one with colors all over it. But as far as the high chair goes we loved every thing about it, super easy to clean and the reclining positions were great for a determined 4 month old..(they always want to be at the table with everyone). Also, many a times my kids fell asleep while eating and rather than wake them, all I had to do is recline the seat and they would sleep with out a problem because it has such a comfy seat cover. It held up wonderfully for 7 years.
